https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cjN5PjizQoosczrZXU6qWhBHRPX.jpg Overwhelmed when a figure from her past reemerges, Joan Verra retreats to the countryside with her son Nathan. There she experiences fragmented recollections of her past romantic encounters. About Joan
